text: My kids absolutely loved the food! The ambiance was delightful, and the service was top-notch. Special thanks to Serena for the warm greeting that made our experience even more memorable.

ate rina and all the staff are accommodating. the kids and parents had so much fun in making pizza, pasta and decoration of the cake with the dough workz. the event was a success. more power to dough workz. thank you dough workz for giving us this kind of activity to share with family

Brought my K2 children here for a field trip. We had an amazing time at the children's pizza workshop! The host, Rina was fantasticâ€”friendly, engaging, and really made the kids feel comfortable and excited about making their own pizzas. The activity was both fun and interactive, with each child getting hands-on experience to roll out dough, add toppings, and even shape their pizzas. It was the perfect balance of creativity and learning, and the best part was that everything was tailored to be age-appropriate. The kids were able to follow along easily and really enjoyed the process. Highly recommend this workshop for any young pizza enthusiasts!

Recently renovated with refreshed decor. Bright and contemporary. Spacious seating spaces. The brownie tasted delicious. Good work to the team to ensure that the ice cream do not melt so fast to avoid soggy brownies.

Tried their newly reopened outlet. Ordered the chicken cheese salsiccia with the 1 for 1. Haven't eaten pastamania in 10years, food was good and new decor is clean and fresh. Alot of natural lighting and service staff was friendly and helpful Rina, Alya, Siti, Nora
